author: sbutler
msg: On the diff-callbacks3 branch, correct a few faults detected by
Julian Foad in his review of the first diff committed to this branch.
(svn_wc_diff_callbacks3_t): Edit comment to clarify the naming of
svn_wc_diff4): initialize a baton with apr_palloc() because zeroing
out the memory is not required.
merge_dir_closed): Remove the initialization of an unused variable.

author: cmpilato
msg: Recommend r30407, r30408, and r30409 for backport.

author: cmpilato
msg: It wouldn't be a normal month without at least one instance of painful

author: cmpilato
msg: Avoid returning the same path multiple times from
copyfrom_path local variable with a full-URL form of it, as we
later use it to test for equality against another relative path.
